long_description: The sleek Arc'teryx Astri 19 Pack offers day hikers, travelers and everyday urban adventurers a simple, low-profile and weather-resistant design that hauls your essentials in comfort. Harness features a removable hipbelt; padded back panel and HDPE framesheet add comfort. Weather-resistant fabric, taped seams and watertight zippers help keep contents dry. Panel-loading main compartment features a strap for holding documents or a 13 in. laptop; white coating on the interior makes it easier to see inside the pack. The Arc'teryx Astri 19 Pack features a zippered front pocket and reflective logo.
short_description: The sleek Arc'teryx Astri 19 Pack offers day hikers, travelers and everyday urban adventurers a simple, low-profile and weather-resistant design that hauls your essentials in comfort.
